summary.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are sorted by the keys and are accessible by key and by index.

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are sorted by the keys and are accessible by key and by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合的泛型版本，請參閱。For the generic version of this collection, see . A項目可以存取，請在其索引鍵，例如在任何項目實作，或依據索引，例如在任何項目實作。A element can be accessed by its key, like an element in any implementation, or by its index, like an element in any implementation. A物件在內部維護兩個陣列來儲存清單，也就是一個陣列的索引鍵的項目和相關聯的值的另一個陣列。A object internally maintains two arrays to store the elements of the list; that is, one array for the keys and another array for the associated values. 每個項目是可以存取為索引鍵/值組物件。Each element is a key/value pair that can be accessed as a object. 金鑰不能是`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 營運物件是項目數目可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量或藉由設定屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by calling or by setting the property explicitly. 針對非常大型物件，您可以藉由設定增加到 64 位元系統上的 2 億個元素的最大容量`enabled`屬性的組態項目`true`在執行階段環境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 項目物件的索引鍵來排序是根據特定實作時指定是建立或根據金鑰本身所提供的實作。The elements of a object are sorted by the keys either according to a specific implementation specified when the is created or according to the implementation provided by the keys themselves. 在任一情況下，不允許重複的索引鍵。In either case, a does not allow duplicate keys. 索引的順序為基礎的排序順序。The index sequence is based on the sort sequence. 項目新增時，它會插入中正確的排序次序，以及編製索引據此調整。When an element is added, it is inserted into in the correct sort order, and the indexing adjusts accordingly. 移除項目時，索引編製也隨之調整。When an element is removed, the indexing also adjusts accordingly. 因此，特定的索引鍵/值組的索引可能會變更加入或移除項目物件。Therefore, the index of a specific key/value pair might change as elements are added or removed from the object. 上的作業物件通常會變慢，相較於因為排序的物件。Operations on a object tend to be slower than operations on a object because of the sorting. 不過，藉由允許存取的值，可透過關聯的索引鍵或索引可提供更大的彈性。However, the offers more flexibility by allowing access to the values either through the associated keys or through the indexes. 可以使用整數索引來存取這個集合中的項目。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 這個集合中的索引都是以零為起始的。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` Visual Basic 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因為每個項目的物件是索引鍵/值組，項目型別不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the object is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Rather, the element type is . 例如: For example: [!code-cpp[Classic SortedList Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic SortedList Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic SortedList Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] `foreach`陳述式是一個包裝函式可讓只讀取，不寫入至集合的列舉值。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化物件，以及如何列印出其索引鍵和值。The following code example shows how to create and initialize a object and how to print out its keys and values. [!code-cpp[Classic SortedList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SortedList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SortedList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A物件可同時支援多個讀取器，只要不修改集合。

span.span: A object can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個索引鍵必須實作介面中的索引鍵的比較能夠物件。Each key must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key in the object. 元素的排序根據實作，每個索引鍵新增至。The elements are sorted according to the implementation of each key added to the . 營運物件是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時物件。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立集合使用不同建構函式，並示範行為的集合差異。The following code example creates collections using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the collections. remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素的排序根據指定實作。The elements are sorted according to the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`參數是`null`，則會使用每個索引鍵的實作; 因此，必須實作每個索引鍵介面，以使用中的索引鍵的比較能夠物件。If the `comparer` parameter is `null`, the implementation of each key is used; therefore, each key must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key in the object. 營運物件是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時物件。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立集合使用不同建構函式，並示範行為的集合差異。The following code example creates collections using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the collections. A物件是範例可以傳遞至這個建構函式的實作。A object is an example of an implementation that can be passed to this constructor. 新物件包含索引鍵和值儲存在一份。The new object contains a copy of the keys and values stored in the . 營運物件是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時物件。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`d`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `d`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立集合使用不同建構函式，並示範行為的集合差異。The following code example creates collections using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the collections. remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許新增或移除項目集合會建立，但不允許修改現有的項目之後。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but does allow the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小集合是唯讀的集合只會防止新增和移除項目; 的包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來存取集合中的特定項目，藉由指定下列語法： `myCollection[key]`。You can use the property to access a specific element in a collection by specifying the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用這個屬性來加入新項目中不存在的索引鍵的值設定物件 (例如`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue)`。You can also use this property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the object (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue)`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，將屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 金鑰不能是`null`，但是值可以是。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 區別`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`，就會傳回指定之索引鍵的值是因為`null`，使用方法或方法，可判斷索引鍵存在於清單中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method or the method to determine if the key exists in the list. 項目的索引鍵來排序是根據特定實作時指定是建立或根據金鑰本身所提供的實作。The elements of a are sorted by the keys either according to a specific implementation specified when the is created or according to the implementation provided by the keys themselves. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 O (log `n`) 運算，其中`n`是。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is . 將屬性設定為 O (log `n`) 作業的索引鍵是否已在。Setting the property is an O(log `n`) operation if the key is already in the . 如果索引鍵不在清單中，設定該屬性是 O (`n`) 運算為未排序的資料或 O (log `n`) 如果在清單結尾處加入新項目。If the key is not in the list, setting the property is an O(`n`) operation for unsorted data, or O(log `n`) if the new element is added at the end of the list. 如果插入會導致一次調整大小，此作業是 O (`n`)。If insertion causes a resize, the operation is O(`n`).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引的順序為基礎的排序順序。The index sequence is based on the sort sequence. 項目新增時，它會插入中正確的排序次序，以及編製索引據此調整。When an element is added, it is inserted into in the correct sort order, and the indexing adjusts accordingly. 移除項目時，索引編製也隨之調整。When an element is removed, the indexing also adjusts accordingly. 因此，特定的索引鍵/值組的索引可能會變更加入或移除項目物件。Therefore, the index of a specific key/value pair might change as elements are added or removed from the object. 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何移除項目從物件。The following code example shows how to remove elements from a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全物件時，必須透過此包裝函式只完成所有作業。To guarantee the thread safety of a object, all operations must be done through this wrapper only. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程的屬性。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. 下列程式碼範例示範如何同步處理物件，決定是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following code example shows how to synchronize a object, determine whether a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的同步處理的版本物件，請使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the object, use the method. 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程的屬性。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic SortedList.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.
